text: Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri, bahora batanga amatungo yabo kugira ngo bazitire inzira y’Imana rero bazoyatanga ayo matungo yabo munyuma yaho hazoba ari umwidogo kuribo hanyuma bazotsindwa, nabamwe bagumye mubuhakanyi bwabo bazokwegeranywa mu muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu
